009package Corner_Detection;
010
011import java.awt.Color;
012import java.util.List;
013
014import ij.IJ;
015import ij.ImagePlus;
016import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
017import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
018import imagingbook.lib.ij.GenericDialogPlus;
019import imagingbook.pub.corners.Corner;
020import imagingbook.pub.corners.GradientCornerDetector;
021import imagingbook.pub.corners.MopsCornerDetector;
022import imagingbook.pub.corners.MopsCornerDetector.Parameters;
023import imagingbook.pub.corners.subpixel.SubpixelMaxInterpolator.Method;
024import imagingbook.pub.corners.util.CornerOverlay;
025
026/**
027 * This plugin demonstrates the use of the MOPS corner detector
028 * (see {@link MopsCornerDetector}).
029 * It calculates the corner positions and shows them as a vector overlay
030 * on top of the source image.
031 * 
032 * @see Find_Corners_Harris
033 * @see Find_Corners_ShiTomasi
034 * 
035 * @author WB
036 * @version 2020/10/04
037 */
038public class Find_Corners_MOPS implements PlugInFilter {
039        
040        private static int Nmax = 0;    // number of corners to show (0 = all)
041        private static Color cornerColor = Color.green;
042        
043        private ImagePlus im;
044        private Parameters params;
045
046    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
047        this.im = im;
048        return DOES_ALL;
049    }
050    
051    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
052        
053        params = new MopsCornerDetector.Parameters();
054                if (!showDialog()) {
055                        return;
056                }
057                
058                GradientCornerDetector cd = new MopsCornerDetector(ip, params);
059                List<Corner> corners = cd.getCorners();
060                
061                // create a vector overlay to mark the resulting corners
062                CornerOverlay oly = new CornerOverlay();
063                oly.strokeColor(cornerColor);
064                oly.strokeWidth(0.25);
065                oly.addItems(corners);
066                im.setOverlay(oly);
067                
068                // (new ImagePlus("MOPS Corner Score", cd.getQ())).show();
069    }
070    
071        private boolean showDialog() {
072                // display dialog , return false if cancelled or on error.
073                GenericDialogPlus dlg = new GenericDialogPlus("Harris Corner Detector");
074                
075                dlg.addCheckbox("Apply pre-filter", params.doPreFilter);
076                dlg.addNumericField("Smoothing radius (\u03C3)", params.sigma, 3);
077                dlg.addNumericField("Corner response threshold (th)", params.scoreThreshold, 0);
078                dlg.addEnumChoice("Subpixel localization", params.maxLocatorMethod);
079                // -----------
080                dlg.addNumericField("Border distance", params.border, 0);
081                dlg.addCheckbox("Clean up corners", params.doCleanUp);
082                dlg.addNumericField("Minimum corner distance", params.dmin, 0);
083                
084                dlg.addNumericField("Corners to show (0 = show all)", Nmax, 0);
085                
086                dlg.showDialog();
087                if(dlg.wasCanceled())
088                        return false;
089                
090                params.doPreFilter = dlg.getNextBoolean();
091                params.sigma = Math.max(0.5, dlg.getNextNumber());      // min 0.5
092                params.scoreThreshold = dlg.getNextNumber();
093                params.maxLocatorMethod = dlg.getNextEnumChoice(Method.class);
094                // -----------
095                params.border = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
096                params.doCleanUp = dlg.getNextBoolean();
097                params.dmin = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
098                
099                Nmax = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
100                
101                if(dlg.invalidNumber()) {
102                        IJ.error("Input Error", "Invalid input number");
103                        return false;
104                }       
105                return true;
106        }
107
108}
